messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: PMK Saitou Manga Ques. URGENT
messages.msgSnippet: There is several pics oof Saitoh looking very bored (several pages in fact) in Peace Maker Kurogane Volume 1, Chapter 1.  Not Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker, the
messages.messageBody:
There is several pics oof Saitoh looking very bored (several pages in fact)
in Peace Maker Kurogane Volume 1, Chapter 1. Not Shinsengumi Imon
Peacemaker, the prequel, which goes up to Vol. 3. PMK only goes up to vol
1. I wish those girls would scanslate the SIPM faster ... ^^;;;
~Saitohworship

--- Tiffany <tnamwong@...> wrote:
> Vol7?
> I downloaded all the stuff from fifay.net and they go up to vol3...I
> saw a pic somewhere out there of Saitou's first encounter with
> Tetsu...sigh
>
> --- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> > I believe Saitou first appears in VOl 7
> >
> >
> > --
> > Barbara Sheridan
> >
> > http://www.barbarasheridan.net
>
>


=====
Saitoh Worship
~Anime Mystique~
